title: Web Search Tool Broken - Google API Configuration Error
context:
CRITICAL BUG: The web_search tool is failing with Google API error:

Error: "google_search_retrieval is not supported; please use google_search field instead"

This breaks Atlas's ability to get current information from the web, including real-time data like Bitcoin prices, news, etc.

REPRODUCTION:
1. Call web_search with any query
2. Tool fails with 400 Bad Request from Google API
3. Suggests using "google_search field instead" 

IMPACT: No web search capability - Atlas cannot get current information

TECHNICAL DETAILS:
- URL: https://generativelanguage.googleapis.com/v1beta/models/gemini-2.0-flash:generateContent
- Error: google_search_retrieval not supported
- Needs migration to google_search field per Google docs
resolution: CLOSED: Duplicate of P0 bug 2026-02-02-p0-web-search-tool-critical-fa. Fixed in commit 71e10ad - changed from googleSearchRetrieval to googleSearch.

messages.content: **Dispatched:** Web Search Tool Broken - Google API Configuration Error
**CLOSED:** Duplicate - fixed in commit 71e10ad via P0 ticket.
